mapper.select: SELECT b.br_no AS brNo, b.phone AS phone, u.name AS name, b.deposit_status AS depositStatus, b.approval_status AS approvalStatus, b.upd_date AS updDate, f.title AS frTitle, f.live_date AS frDate FROM booking_requests AS b JOIN facility_rental AS f ON(b.fr_no = f.fr_no) JOIN `user` AS u ON(b.username = u.username) WHERE f.username = #{username} ORDER BY b.upd_date DESC

SELECT b.br_no AS brNo, f.title AS frTitle, f.phone AS frPhone, u.name AS name, f.address AS frAddress, f.account AS frAccount, b.deposit_status AS depositStatus, b.approval_status AS approvalStatus FROM booking_requests AS b JOIN facility_rental AS f ON (b.fr_no = f.fr_no) JOIN user AS u ON (f.username = u.username) WHERE b.username = #{username} ORDER BY b.upd_date DESC
